name: Fruit Catcher
description: This games is created by Siddhant Verma alone.In this game you have to click on fruit to catch them. Each time you catch a fruit you will get points. There are 3 modes in this game. 15 Level with Survival and Sandbox. Thee are more than 6 Fruits. This is the first game of Siddhant Verma and Siddhant Studios.
